text: Uchida (Japanese: 内田) is a common Japanese surname. Notable people with this name are listed as below. *Yosh Uchida - American businessman, entrepreneur, judo coach and educator ==Musicians== *Mitsuko Uchida - Japanese pianist *Yuya Uchida (singer) ==Footballers== *Atsuto Uchida *Jun Uchida *Hifuyo Uchida *Teppei Uchida *Kenichiro Uchida *Toshihiro Uchida *Tomoya Uchida Category:Japanese-language surnames
title: Uchida (surname)
